thread.title: Save an extra 10% off at Travelzoo with this discount code until Monday
thread.title_full: Save an extra 10% off at Travelzoo with this discount code until Monday - Mirror Online

author: Chantelle Symester
title: Save an extra 10% off at Travelzoo with this discount code until Monday
text:
Whether you're planning a short getaway in the UK or plan on treating yourself to a sumptuous spa weekend, you can save an extra 10% off on selected deals with Travelzoo .
The extra savings are valid on selected restaurant , spa or activity packages and selected hotel voucher deals - ideal if you need a mini break over autumn. You can see hotel offers included in the deal here .
The 10% discount is taken off your basket total, all you have to do is enter the UK10S15 code at checkout to get the savings until 23:59 on 14 September 2015.
You can't use the offer with any cashback transactions, or in conjunction with other deals or promotions.
Top 5 deals Here's a run down of the five best deals included in the offer:
1. Historic Yorkshire Getaway and meal at Holdsworth House Hotel : £129 - save 39%
2. Two night break in Snowdonia, plus breakfast for two people : £99 - save 42%
3. Overnight stay in the Lake District at Stonecross Manor Hotel, plus meals for two people : £109 - save 49%
4. Stay at the Queens Court Hotel in Exeter with a six course gourmet meal : £99 - save 32%
5. Dinner and B&B stay at BEST WESTERN Crown Hotel in North Yorkshire for two : £99 - save 38%
